article_title: Somali-Americans react to Obama's final State of the Union address

article_metadata.description: On a typical weeknight, the four flat-screen TVs inside the Capitol Café in Minneapolis buzz with European soccer matches, basketball games and reality shows.

og.description: Gatherings like Tuesday's viewing party have become a tradition for Minneapolis' Somali-American community since Obama took office in 2008.
og.title: Somali-Americans react to Obama's final State of the Union address
